dynamic_line.no: Oh, a pleasure to meet you. Welcome to the Hall of Artifacts, <name_g>.

dynamic_line: So, what is it you desire?
This is the Hall of Artifacts, where our most prized possessions are kept. I am responsible for their care. As you can see, they are kept under heavy guard.
Oh, the artifacts? You see, they were gifts unto us from our patron. They hold powerful magic within them. All but two came from our communers.

responses.text: Could you tell me more about one?

dynamic_line: They spend long hours alone, reaching out to our patron. Occaisionally, a gift shall be brought to them. The most powerful of these, we keep here.
Okay, which one? It is my duty as Lorevessel.
Ah, the Archae Aesthetica. It is the first thing we ever put here. Our founder recieved this directly from the Elder Ones. It is written within their language, only of which the cult is literate.

Oh, the Candlelight Femur. Its rather strange; the only bit of pyromancy we possess. It accepts crystal magic, the spell it casts similar to one of our own, though it erupts on fire. Somewhat fitting; the one who recieved it had a fondness for flame.
The Longsword? That is one of two artifacts our founder recieved, the other being the Archae
